name: Stopgap
description:
Stopgap is a short but sweet game, in which you fight your way through five levels to defend the earth against the alien threat!

This is my first ever game, and I would greatly appreciate constructive feedback for improvements, and ideas, for development of this, and future games.

Also it if you enjoy the game, it would be greatly appreciated if you could support my work via Patreon at - https://www.patreon.com/darkpulsedave
